con:parameter.con:name: vldbProperties
con:parameter.con:value: VLDB Select;VLDB Select,Data Retrieval Mode,,VLDB Select,Data Retrieval Parameters

con:testStep.name: ==== Test Case : import file from local ====

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.*
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Login").getProperty("Response").getValue() log.info response def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def session = responseJSON.sessionState log.info session
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue( "session", session)

import groovy.json.*
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DICreateEMMAReportInstance").getProperty("Response").getValue() log.info response def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def msgid = responseJSON.msgid log.info msgid
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "msgID", msgid)

import groovy.json.* def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("RemoveOrDuplicateRI").getProperty("response").getValue() log.info response def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def msgidNew = responseJSON.msgid log.info msgidNew
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("msgidNew",msgidNew)

import groovy.json.*
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DICreateEMMASourceTable").getProperty("response").getValue() log.info response
def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def tableid = responseJSON.tbid log.info tableid
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("tableID",tableid)

import groovy.json.* import com.microstrategy.DataService.DSHelper
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("SearchAfterCreateDBRole").getProperty("Response").getValue() def id = DSHelper.getDBRoleID(testRunner.testCase.getProperty("DSNname1").getValue(),response,log) log.info id assert id != ""
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("dbrid",id)

import groovy.json.*
import com.eviware.soapui.support.JsonUtil
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("catalogActionColumn").getProperty("Response").getValue() log.info response
//def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def responseJSON = new JsonUtil().parseTrimmedText(response) log.info responseJSON
def cln = responseJSON.xrc.cas.tis.clis def s = " cad:-1, cmid:00000000000000000000000000000000, sta:2, " log.info cln
cln=cln.toString().replaceAll(s,"").replaceAll("tp","dttp").replaceAll(" prec","dtps").replaceAll(" scl","dtsc") cln=cln.replace(",dt:[","\",\"").replaceAll(":","\":\"").replace("[cln","{\"cln").replace("]]","\"}").replace("\"}\"}","\"}")
log.info cln cln=cln.replace(",dtps","\",\"dtps").replace(",dtsc","\",\"dtsc").replace("[[[","[")
log.info cln
// //def clns = "[{\"cln\":\"DeleteColumn\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"DeleteRow\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"RemoveDuplicateCells\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"ExtractFromTo\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"FRCharInCell\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"FRCell\",\"dtps\":\"53\",\"dttp\":\"7\",\"dtsc\":\"-1\"},{\"cln\":\"CutOn\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"CutBefore\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"CutAfter\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"SplitByFieldLengths\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"ToCase\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"Unescape\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"TypeNumber\",\"dtps\":\"53\",\"dttp\":\"7\",\"dtsc\":\"-1\"},{\"cln\":\"TypeText\",\"dtps\":\"53\",\"dttp\":\"7\",\"dtsc\":\"-1\"},{\"cln\":\"TypeDate\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"FillDown\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"BlankDown\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"PadBefore\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"PadAfter\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"WhitespaceTrim\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"WhitespaceCollapse\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"Duplicate\",\"dtps\":\"53\",\"dttp\":\"7\",\"dtsc\":\"-1\"},{\"cln\":\"Rename\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"Concatenate1\",\"dtps\":\"53\",\"dttp\":\"7\",\"dtsc\":\"-1\"},{\"cln\":\"Concatenate2\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"Transpose1\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"Transpose2\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"},{\"cln\":\"EditApplyToAll\",\"dtps\":\"53\",\"dttp\":\"7\",\"dtsc\":\"-1\"},{\"cln\":\"EditSingleCell\",\"dtps\":\"255\",\"dttp\":\"18\",\"dtsc\":\"-2147483648\"}]"
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("clns",cln)

import groovy.json.* import com.eviware.soapui.support.JsonUtil def response = testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("GetReportXDADefinition -create WD project id").getProperty("response").getValue() def responseJSON if(JsonUtil.isValidJson(response)) responseJSON = new JsonUtil().parseTrimmedText(response) log.info responseJSON
def DWProjectID = responseJSON.datap.srce.rimp.rpid
log.info DWProjectID
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DWProjectID",DWProjectID)

import com.microstrategy.DW.DWHelper import com.microstrategy.DW.DWFunctions def fcfile = testRunner.testCase.getProperty("function.dwt").getValue().toString() String[] action = ["DeleteColumn"] def data = DWHelper.getPostData(DWFunctions.DELETECOLOMN,action,null,fcfile,log) log.info data testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DataWranglerServer.Delete.Colomn").setPropertyValue("postData",data)

def tableID= testRunner.testCase.getProperty("tableID").getValue() def extParams="""<ts><tb did=\"$tableID\" ac=\"1\"/></ts> """ log.info """extParams : $extParams""" testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("saveAndPublishCube").setPropertyValue("folderID",folderId) testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("searchMetadata2").setPropertyValue("folderID",folderId) testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("saveAndPublishCube").setPropertyValue("extParams",extParams) //testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("searchMetadata2").setPropertyValue("extParams",extParams)

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.*
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Login").getProperty("Response").getValue() log.info response def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def session = responseJSON.sessionState log.info session
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue( "session", session)

import groovy.json.*
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DICreateEMMAReportInstance").getProperty("Response").getValue() log.info response def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def msgid = responseJSON.msgid log.info msgid
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "msgID", msgid)

import groovy.json.* def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("RemoveOrDuplicateRI").getProperty("response").getValue() log.info response def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def msgidNew = responseJSON.msgid log.info msgidNew
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("msgidNew",msgidNew)

import groovy.json.*
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DICreateEMMASourceTable").getProperty("response").getValue() log.info response
def responseJSON = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def tableid = responseJSON.tbid log.info tableid
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("tableID",tableid)

import groovy.json.* import com.microstrategy.DataService.DSHelper
def response = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("SearchAfterCreateDBRole").getProperty("Response").getValue() def id = DSHelper.getDBRoleID(testRunner.testCase.getProperty("DSNname1").getValue(),response,log) log.info id assert id != ""
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("dbrid",id)

import groovy.json.* import com.eviware.soapui.support.JsonUtil def response = testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("GetReportXDADefinition -create WD project id").getProperty("response").getValue() def responseJSON if(JsonUtil.isValidJson(response)) responseJSON = new JsonUtil().parseTrimmedText(response) log.info responseJSON
def DWProjectID = responseJSON.datap.srce.rimp.rpid
log.info DWProjectID
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DWProjectID",DWProjectID)

import com.microstrategy.DW.DWHelper import com.microstrategy.DW.DWFunctions
def fcfile = testRunner.testCase.getProperty("function.dwt").getValue().toString() String[] action = ["SplitOn","\\\\\\\\"] def data = DWHelper.getPostData(DWFunctions.SPLITBYSEPARATOR,action,null,fcfile,log) log.info data testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DataWranglerServer.Split.Byseparator.\\\\").setPropertyValue("postData",data)

def folderId = jsonresponse.did log.info """folderid: $folderId"""
def tableID= testRunner.testCase.getProperty("tableID").getValue() def extParams="""<ts><tb did=\"$tableID\" ac=\"1\"/></ts> """ log.info """extParams : $extParams""" testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("saveAndPublishCube").setPropertyValue("folderID",folderId) testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("searchMetadata2").setPropertyValue("folderID",folderId) testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("saveAndPublishCube").setPropertyValue("extParams",extParams) //testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("searchMetadata2").setPropertyValue("extParams",extParams)

import com.microstrategy.DW.DWHelper import com.microstrategy.DW.DWFunctions
def fcfile = testRunner.testCase.getProperty("function.dwt").getValue().toString() String[] action = ["START_Date","1900-04-01T00\\\\:00\\\\:00Z"] def data = DWHelper.getPostData(DWFunctions.FINDANDREPLACECUTON,action,null,fcfile,log) log.info data testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DataWranglerServer.Remove.Date").setPropertyValue("postData",data)

import com.microstrategy.DW.DWHelper import com.microstrategy.DW.DWFunctions
def fcfile = testRunner.testCase.getProperty("function.dwt").getValue().toString() String[] action = ["START_Date","1900-01-01T00:00:00Z","1900/01/01 00:00:00","datetime"] def data = DWHelper.getPostData(DWFunctions.EDITAPPLYALL,action,null,fcfile,log) log.info data testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DataWranglerServer.Edit.Date").setPropertyValue("postData",data)

con:testStep.name: ==== Test Case : end the DW enter the MTDI File1 ====

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.* import com.eviware.soapui.support.JsonUtil def response = testRunner. testCase.getTestStepByName("GetReportXDADefinitionFile2 -create WD project id").getProperty("response").getValue() def responseJSON if(JsonUtil.isValidJson(response)) responseJSON = new JsonUtil().parseTrimmedText(response) log.info responseJSON
def DWProjectID = responseJSON.datap.srce.rimp.rpid
log.info DWProjectID
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DWProjectID2File",DWProjectID)

con:testStep.name: ==== Test Case : DW Action for File2 ====

con:config.script:
import com.microstrategy.DW.DWHelper import com.microstrategy.DW.DWFunctions
def fcfile = testRunner.testCase.getProperty("function.dwt").getValue().toString() String[] action = ["MyMetric",".","\$\$"] def data = DWHelper.getPostData(DWFunctions.FINDANDREPLACECHARINCELL,action,null,fcfile,log) log.info data testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DataWranglerServer.FindAndReplace.CharInCell").setPropertyValue("postData",data)

import com.microstrategy.DW.DWHelper import com.microstrategy.DW.DWFunctions
def fcfile = testRunner.testCase.getProperty("function.dwt").getValue().toString() String[] action = ["MyMetric","1","2","44\$12"] def data = DWHelper.getPostData(DWFunctions.EDITSINGLECELL,action,null,fcfile,log) log.info data testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("DataWranglerServer.Edit.\$").setPropertyValue("postData",data)
